clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Focal increased uptake in axillary lymph nodes, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in axillary lymph nodes with SUVmax 14.31.
Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in axillary lymph nodes, suggestive of malignancy.
Mild inflammatory uptake in axillary lymph nodes region.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
